snippet: Eric T. Schneiderman unveiled an animal protection campaign with two goals: reducing abuses in “puppy mills” and shutting down dogfighting rings.
abstract: New York State Atty Gen Eric T Schneiderman unveils animal protection initiative intended to goal protect state's pets by reducing abuses in so-called puppy mills and shutting down dogfighting rings.

byline.original: By THOMAS KAPLAN and MARY PILON
byline.contributor: Thomas Kaplan reported from Albany, and Mary Pilon from New York.

lead_paragraph: Eric T. Schneiderman unveiled an animal protection campaign with two goals: reducing abuses in “puppy mills” and shutting down dogfighting rings.

headline.seo: New York Attorney General Unveils Animal Protection Initiative
headline.main: With Initiative, Attorney General Focuses on New York’s Pets
headline.print_headline: Attorney General Turns Focus to New York’s Pets
